task.title: Exploring class relationships
task.shortdesc: Class relationships and dependencies are displayed with the Hierarchical Edge Bundling Tool.

stepsection.note:
Several features make the tool easier to use:
Click and hold on the disk to spin it. This feature allows you to read class names upright.
Hold Ctrl and scroll the mouse wheel to adjust the zoom level.
Use the tension slider to declutter the disk and make it easier to follow dependedcies.

step.cmd: Select the class you want to examine.
step.info: Mouseover the class of interest. The class name will turn blue to indicate it is under observation.
step.stepresult: The tool displays outgoing classes in green and incoming classes in red.
